title: Javascript
text: JavaScript (JS) is a lightweight, interpreted, or just-in-time compiled programming language with first-class functions.

title: Sequelize
text: Sequelize is a promise-based Node.js ORM for Postgres, MySQL, MariaDB, SQLite and Microsoft SQL Server. It features solid transaction support, relations, eager and lazy loading, read replication and more.

title: Web Widget
text: An applet intended to be used within web pages
